tests.name: to array
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (f0 VARCHAR) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='DELIMITED');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT cast(f0 as ARRAY<INTEGER>) FROM TEST;

expectedException.message: Only casts to primitive types or decimals are supported: ARRAY<INTEGER>

tests.name: to map
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (f0 VARCHAR) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='DELIMITED');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT cast(f0 as MAP<VARCHAR, INTEGER>) FROM TEST;

expectedException.message: Only casts to primitive types or decimals are supported: MAP<VARCHAR, INTEGER>

tests.name: to struct
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (f0 VARCHAR) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='DELIMITED');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT cast(f0 as STRUCT<F0 VARCHAR, F1 INTEGER>) FROM TEST;

expectedException.message: Only casts to primitive types or decimals are supported: STRUCT<F0 STRING, F1 INTEGER>

tests.name: no op
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (b BOOLEAN, i INT, bi BIGINT, d DOUBLE, s VARCHAR) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='DELIMITED');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT cast(b as BOOLEAN), cast(i as INT), cast(bi as BIGINT), cast(d as DOUBLE), cast(s as STRING) FROM TEST;

tests.name: of nulls
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (ignored VARCHAR) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='DELIMITED');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT cast(null as BOOLEAN), cast(null as INT), cast(null as BIGINT), cast(null as DOUBLE), cast(null as STRING) FROM TEST;

tests.name: decimal to decimal
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (foo DECIMAL(4,2)) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='DELIMITED');
CREATE STREAM OUT AS SELECT cast(foo AS DECIMAL(5,3)) FROM TEST;

tests.name: integer to decimal
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (foo INTEGER) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='AVRO');
CREATE STREAM OUT AS SELECT cast(foo AS DECIMAL(2,1)) as VAL FROM TEST;

tests.name: double to decimal
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (foo DOUBLE) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='AVRO');
CREATE STREAM OUT AS SELECT cast(foo AS DECIMAL(2,1)) as VAL FROM TEST;

tests.name: string to decimal
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (foo VARCHAR) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='AVRO');
CREATE STREAM OUT AS SELECT cast(foo AS DECIMAL(2,1)) as VAL FROM TEST;

tests.name: decimal to other
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (val DECIMAL(4,2)) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='AVRO');
CREATE STREAM OUT AS SELECT cast(val AS INT) as i, cast(val AS BIGINT) as l, cast(val as DOUBLE) as d, cast(val AS STRING) as s FROM TEST;
